name: 1st Class Poker & BlackJack
synopsis: Welcome on board our casino ship for first-class poker and blackjack! Rarely have there been so many variations of Poker, BlackJack and Videopoker in a single collection: Texas Hold’em, Double Flop Hold’em, Omaha, Pineapple and many more classics are waiting for you. Win the tournament or challenge your friends in local multiplayer mode with up to five participants. You can extensively adjust the game according to your own rules, choosing computer opponents from beginners to pros. Celebrate your victories and communicate with the aid of the integrated voice and text chat. The amusing graphics and even your own photo in the game make this collection a first class poker package. Enjoy 1st Class Poker & BlackJack!
